prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: When Stefan insisted I watch the movie he told me about on Christmas Day 2024, and made a direct reference to himself from it, was there an underlying message to it, or was it an honest friendly suggestion?

Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant's 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Melissa Gale – Relevant Horary Chart Data for Analysis:

1. Key House Positions:
 • Ascendant (1st House) at 19° Aries – represents you.
 • Ascendant’s 9th House begins at 22° Sagittarius – designated for Stefan.
 • Cross reference: In traditional assignment using the provided guide, Stefan’s significator aligns with the 9th house from your Ascendant.

2. Planetary Positions:
 • Sun at 18° Aquarius
 • Moon at 4° Gemini
 • Mercury at 15° Aquarius
 • Venus at 1° Aries
 • Mars at 18° 59′ Cancer (retrograde)
 • Jupiter at 11° 17′ Gemini
 • Saturn at 18° 2′ Pisces
 • Uranus at 23° 16′ Taurus
 • Neptune at 28° 8′ Pisces
 • Pluto at 2° 13′ Aquarius
 • North Node at 29° 33′ Pisces (retrograde)
 • Chiron at 19° 40′ Aries

3. House Placements (from Melissa’s horary chart):
 • 1st House (self): 19° Aries; contains Uranus and Chiron.
 • 2nd House: Begins at 29° Taurus; contains Moon and Jupiter.
 • 3rd House: Begins at 22° Gemini.
 • 4th House: Begins at 9° Cancer; contains Mars.
 • 5th House: Begins at 28° Cancer.
 • 6th House: Begins at 29° Leo.
 • 7th House: Begins at 19° Libra.
 • 8th House: Begins at 29° Scorpio.
 • 9th House (Stefan’s significator): Begins at 22° Sagittarius.
 • 10th House: Begins at 9° Capricorn.
 • 11th House: Begins at 28° Capricorn; contains Sun, Mercury, Pluto.
 • 12th House: Begins at 29° Aquarius; contains Venus, Saturn, Neptune, North Node.

4. Major Aspects (orb noted):
 • MC Opposition IC (orb 0°)
 • Chiron Conjunction Ascendant (orb 0°)
 • Mars Trine Saturn (orb 0°)
 • Venus Sextile Pluto (orb 1°)
 • Sun Sextile Ascendant (orb 1°)
 • Sun Sextile Chiron (orb 1°)
 • Mars Square Ascendant (orb 1°)
 • Mars Square Chiron (orb 1°)
 • Neptune Conjunction North Node (orb 1°)
 • Venus Conjunction North Node (orb 2°)
 • Moon Trine Pluto (orb 2°)
 • Pluto Sextile North Node (orb 3°)
 • Moon Sextile Venus (orb 3°)
 • Venus Conjunction Neptune (orb 3°)
 • Sun Conjunction Mercury (orb 3°)
 • Mercury Sextile Ascendant (orb 4°)
 • Mercury Sextile Chiron (orb 4°)
 • Mercury Trine Jupiter (orb 4°)
 • Uranus Sextile Neptune (orb 5°)
 • Saturn Sextile Uranus (orb 5°)
 • Mars Sextile Uranus (orb 5°)
 • Sun Square Uranus (orb 5°)
 • Moon Sextile Neptune (orb 6°)
 • Jupiter Square Saturn (orb 7°)
 • Moon Conjunction Jupiter (orb 7°)
 • Sun Trine Jupiter (orb 7°)

5. Chart Patterns and Additional Observations:
 • The chart forms a Bowl shape.
 • Dominant element: Air among inner planets.
 • Dominant mode: Cardinal signs.
 • Notable emptiness: Right hemisphere (bottom right and top right quadrants) show no planetary placements.
 • Multiple aspects involving the Ascendant: Chiron’s conjunction and Mars’ square to both Ascendant and Chiron.
 • Sun, Mercury, and Pluto are clustered in the 11th House, contributing to an emphasis on intellectual and group dynamics.
 • Venus, Saturn, Neptune, and North Node populate the 12th House, possibly indicating subtle, behind-the-scenes or subconscious influences.

6. Timing and Communication Indicators:
 • Mercury’s position (15° Aquarius) and its aspects (conjunction with the Sun, sextile to Ascendant and Chiron, trine to Jupiter) point toward communication nuances.
 • The involvement of platforms tied to foreign/extra-local influence (9th House) for Stefan suggests the need to assess any distance, unconventional messaging, or subtle overtones in his approach.

This encapsulates the essential horary data using traditional principles. Document these data points for your further interpretation regarding the underlying message versus an honest friendly suggestion.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Based on the horary data, the following interpretation emerges:

1. The querent’s significator (Ascendant in Aries) is in a chart marked by open, honest communication. Mercury in Aquarius—supportive in its sextile to both the Ascendant and Chiron, and trining Jupiter—suggests that your communications are clear and unambiguous. This reinforces an impression of Stefan’s suggestion being delivered in a straightforward, friendly manner.

2. Stefan’s representative is the Ascendant’s 9th house (starting 22° Sagittarius). Though this house is devoid of planets, its nature—as a house of higher perspective and foreign influences—places the emphasis on ideas and broad views rather than personal manipulation. The absence of challenging planets in this house implies that his role is more that of a messenger carrying an open invitation than that of a schemer with hidden meanings.

3. Noteworthy are the aspects involving Mars. Mars in Cancer (retrograde) forms a square with both the Ascendant and Chiron. These aspects introduce a slight tension or intensity to the proceedings. Such tension does not necessarily indicate malice; rather, it may point to an unintentional forcefulness in his delivery. This could be interpreted as him inadvertently emphasizing a matter that might stir an emotional response in you.

4. The overall chart is characterized by a Bowl shape and a dominance of air and cardinal energy. This configuration favors clear, rational thought and direct communication. The harmonious aspects among Mercury, the Sun, and Jupiter further support an interpretation of straightforward intent, rather than a secret or coded message.

5. While Mars’ challenging angles advise a degree of emotional alertness, no other significant indicators point toward an underlying, concealed message. The supportive aspects of Mercury indicate that his reference was meant to be taken at face value—even if his manner carried a touch of extra intensity.

Based on these elements in your horary chart, the indication is that Stefan’s movie recommendation—despite the intensity suggested by Mars—is primarily an honest, friendly suggestion rather than a deliberate attempt to convey a hidden message.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have given you a case file on Stefan that includes the entire history between myself and him. The Christmas Day conversation is also within this case file. Please review it and assess the chart again for interpretation.

 If it still comes to be that it was just a friendly suggestion, then that is perfectly fine. It means that I was the one who misinterpreted his intentions and meaning, and I will have to recalibrate my thoughts, feelings, and approach.

 But I'll appreciate a clear, objective reinterpretation now that you have access to review his case file and the entire history.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Based on the composite data from your horary chart and the detailed case file history with Stefan, the following interpretation is indicated:

1. The horary chart remains dominated by clear, air-sign energy and cardinal intent. Mercury’s supportive aspects (conjunction with the Sun and trine with Jupiter) strongly favor straightforward communication. This suggests that the movie recommendation, as delivered on Christmas Day, was meant to be taken at face value rather than as an encoded message.

2. Stefan’s representation by the Ascendant’s 9th house (the realm of higher perspective, philosophy, and foreign or broader influences) is notably unoccupied by any malefic or secretive influences. Its emptiness supports an interpretation of his participation as expressing ideas and personal tastes without covert subtext.

3. Although Mars in Cancer (retrograde) forms squares to both the Ascendant and Chiron, introducing a tension that may amplify your emotional response, this aspect primarily reflects your heightened sensitivity to his manner of communication rather than a deliberate signal from him. This tension explains why you experienced a deeper emotional stir when he pressed the point about the film.

4. Reviewing the case file history, there is a consistent thematic undercurrent: Stefan values your friendship and connection, yet he has clearly maintained boundaries within his familial commitments. His recollections of conversation at the restaurant, as well as subsequent dialogues, consistently reflect friendly, playful banter rather than a covert attempt to steer the relationship toward a more intimate or hidden romantic signal.

5. The persistent emphasis on the movie “Love Actually” and the repeated urging for you to watch it on Christmas appears to be his manner of suggesting that romance exists in its own right in narratives—but it aligns with his overall mode of communication, blending friendly advice with a subtle reminder of shared, positive memories. There are no indicators of deliberate manipulation or double meanings beyond what might be your innate projection of desire in a situation where emotional boundaries are already blurred.

Based on these specific indicators—the clarity and forthright nature of Mercury’s aspects, the lack of hidden influences in the 9th house, and the broader context from your case file—the chart shows that Stefan’s reference was, indeed, an honest, friendly suggestion rather than a coded missive carrying a deeper, covert message.

The conclusion is founded on the available data: your interpretation of his intentions might have been heightened by your emotional projection. Recalibration of your approach may be called for, in line with the objective clarity the chart provides.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I'm still trying to learn this method of astrology, but when the house representing another is empty, in this case my 9th house representing Stefan as a foreign connection, because he's from Munich Germany, shouldn't you take that house's ruler to find where he's at in the chart, correct? 

So in this case it would be Jupiter. Well Jupiter is in my 2nd house, which would be Stefan's 5th house, is that correct? 

If so, from his 5th house placement, Jupiter makes a trine to Mercury in my 11th house, which would also be correct, because the phone call that day was facilitated by a mutual connection.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Your reasoning is sound. In traditional horary practice, when the house representing another is empty—in this case your 9th house for Stefan—the focus shifts to its ruling planet to locate his influence in the chart. With your 9th house ruled by Jupiter, its placement becomes essential.

Here, Jupiter is in your 2nd house. Using your guide, that corresponds to Stefan's 5th house. The fact that Jupiter in this placement forms a trine to Mercury in your 11th house aligns perfectly with the circumstances of that phone call, which was facilitated by a mutual connection from your 11th house sphere.

Thus, the planetary mapping confirms that his influence is active through his 5th house energies, reinforcing the friendly and communicative nature of his contact, as symbolized by Mercury.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: What do the 5th house energies represent?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes: The 5th house represents themes of romance, creativity, and personal pleasure. It governs our capacity for playful self-expression, enjoyment of life's aesthetic and artistic pursuits, and spontaneous creative ventures. In the context of interpersonal communication, it embodies the glitter of flirtation, the spirit of love affairs, and the pursuit of joy and entertainment. In your situation, the activation of Stefan’s energies through the 5th house underlines his expression in a lighthearted, non-serious manner—centering on fun, creative expression, and the pleasure of a shared moment.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Please look at your answer to what the fifth house represents again, because it predominantly represents romance, personal pleasure, and love affairs.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes: Yes, your observation is correct. The 5th house primarily governs romance, personal pleasure, and love affairs, in addition to creative self-expression. In this context, Stefan’s energies represented by the 5th house underscore a light, playful, and potentially flirtatious tone. The involvement of his significator as located in your 5th house reinforces that the communication—despite any emotional intensity you might have sensed—carries the flavor of romantic or pleasurable interaction rather than something deeply coded or hidden.
